remarks: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is an extended metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
imsmet.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
imsmet.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
imsxmet $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
